serviceDescription: Responsible for automatic updates to the Windows operating system and other Microsoft software.
Manages user account and group information and is responsible for enforcing security policies.
Enables access to remote file servers and printers.
Resolves and caches Domain Name System (DNS) names.
Monitors system security settings and provides notifications for security-related events.
Enables scheduling of automatic tasks and scripts.

serviceDisplay: Problem Reports and Solutions Control Panel Support
serviceDescription: Provides support for the Problem Reports and Solutions control panel.
Detects and notifies of hardware events and provides automatic management of hotplug devices.
Preloads frequently used applications into memory to improve system performance.
Enables troubleshooting and diagnostic services for the operating system and applications.
Manages printing jobs in the system queue and communicates with printer drivers.
Manages audio devices for Windows-based programs.
Provides fast search capabilities for files, email, and other content on the computer.
Provides tunnel connectivity using IPv6 transition technologies.
Manages themes and visual styles in Windows.
